version_description:
- Minor bug fixes
- Support for larger screen on iPhone 5
- Improved interruption support (the timer will now keep running if you ignore a phone call coming in, or will continue after a call ends if you take the call)

- Minor bug fixes
- Support for larger screen on iPhone 5
- Improved interruption support (the timer will now keep running if you ignore a phone call coming in, or will continue after a call ends if you take the call)

- Support for larger screen on iPhone 5
- Improved interruption support (the timer will now keep running if you ignore a phone call coming in, or will continue after a call ends if you take the call)

- Improved interruption support (the timer will now keep running if you ignore a phone call coming in, or will continue after a call ends if you take the call)

- Improved interruption support (the timer will now keep running if you ignore a phone call coming in, or will continue after a call ends if you take the call)

Bug fixes and performance improvements.
See https://www.simpletouchsoftware.com/support/tabatapro/36/ for full release notes.

• New Apple Watch app.
• Log sessions to Apple Health as workouts or mindfulness.
• Added help and support integrated into the app.
• Control the sharing of analytics.
• Added new timer cooldown interval.
• New audio library browser with search and recent selections allows selection of songs,
albums, and artists in addition to playlists for Workout DJ.
• New quick-keys allow quick selection of duration and counts.
• Fixed bug where changing the preset in the tabata preset settings screen
was not updating the display for the current preset.

For full details see the release notes under support in Tabata Pro.

• New Apple Watch app.
• Log sessions to Apple Health as workouts or mindfulness.
• Help and support integrated into the app.
• Control the sharing of analytics.
• Added new timer cooldown interval.
• New audio library browser for Workout DJ.
• Quick-set keys allow quick selection of duration and counts.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

3.10.1:
• Improved Audio Library artwork
• Swimming activities on Apple Watch automatically enable water lock.
• Double-tap session screen on the watch to pause and resume.
• Fixes a regression in Workout DJ behavior related to advancing to next song.
• Bug fixes, performance, and other small improvements.

For full details see the release notes under support inside the app.

• New Apple Watch app.
• Log sessions to Apple Health as workouts or mindfulness.
• Help and support integrated into the app.
• Control the sharing of analytics.

3.10.1:
• Improved Audio Library artwork
• Swimming activities on Apple Watch automatically enable water lock.
• Double-tap session screen on the watch to pause and resume.
• Fixes a regression in Workout DJ behavior related to advancing to next song.
• Bug fixes, performance, and other small improvements.

3.10.2:
• Program quick-set keys on the duration and count pickers with a long-press gesture.
• Manually enable water lock on Apple Watch during timer session from a deep-press gesture menu item.
• Current interval progress bar added to the secondary session screen on Apple Watch.
• Set the alert volume in preset settings on Apple Watch.
• Pause/resume the timer with a double-tap gesture on the secondary session screen on Apple Watch.
• Fixes an issue where the timer screen would shut off after timer was paused and resumed.
• Fixes Workout DJ songs will not resume if Resume and Shuffle are selected in a cycle.
• Bug fixes, performance, and other small improvements.

For full details, see the release notes under support inside the app.

Redesigned external display user interface when using screen mirroring to an Apple TV

New in Version 3.10
---------------------
• New Apple Watch app.
• Log sessions to Apple Health as workouts or mindfulness.
• Help and support integrated into the app.
• Control the sharing of analytics.
• Added new timer cooldown interval.
• New audio library browser for Workout DJ.
• Quick-set keys allow quick selection of duration and counts.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

For full details, see the release notes under support inside the app.

Thank you for using Tabata Pro!
